history.proof: split. - intros H. induction H. + hauto lq: on use: app_nil_l, app_nil_end, in_split. + destruct IHlist_has_dup as [x' [aa [bb [cc H']]]]. exists x', (x :: aa), bb, cc. simpl. rewrite H'. reflexivity. - intros [x [aa [bb [cc H]]]]. subst. qauto use: list_has_dup_app_left, in_eq, in_or_app, in_list_hd0.

exceptions.tactic: exists x, nil, aa, bb, cc.
exceptions.exn: The reference aa was not found in the current environment.
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros X m. split. - intros H. induction H. + exists x, nil, aa, bb, cc. reflexivity. + destruct IHlist_has_dup as [x' [aa [bb [cc H']]]]. exists x', (x :: aa), bb, cc. simpl. rewrite H'. reflexivity. - intros [x [aa [bb [cc H]]]]. subst. apply in_list_hd0. apply in_elt.
